job.title: Remote Software Engineer
job.description: If you are a Software Engineer with experience please read onbrbrWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Build out fast responsive websites that are optimized for frictionless user experience in a marketing amp sales domainlili Work closely with the product owner and software engineer manager to develop and enhance websites based on an agreed roadmap and execute using Agile SDLClili Incorporate inputs from marketing UX team SEO amp optimization teams to AB test and continuously evolve consumer facing websiteslili Monitor the performance of the applications with a focus on uptime amp fast response timelili Work in an Agile Scrum team to participate and deliver sprint objectivesbrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli Bachelors degree with experience of 5 years handson software developmentlili Expertise in building consumer facing websites in marketing and sales domain using any of the javascript and typescript based web application frameworks ideally but not limited to a tech stack that includes React Javascript Redux NextJSlili Proven ability to build web applications using Rest based microservices and content rich sites using a CMSlili Familiar with Marketing concepts like AB Testing SEO analytics conversion rates campaign monitoring email marketing etclili Proficiency in the following areas OOP using NET or Java CSS HTML5 AWS or Azure CICD MVC RDBMS NewRelic Optimizely Headless CMS like PrismiciobrliulWhats In It for YoubrulliFull BenefitsliliBonus  EquityliliPTObrliulSo if you are a Software Engineer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrKendallMooreCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  KM141643230  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulKendall Moore  Recruiter  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by
